content.description: Climb up enjoying every chert bomb/cannonball handhold/foothold plus the featured limestone.
content.protection: 1/2" bolt/hangers to sport anchors (clip and lower from anchors)
content.location: Right of Stir It UP, currently right most route, lowest in the gully

content.description: Climb up Â on the chert balls choosing only the best.
content.protection: 1/2" bolt/hangers to sport anchors (clip and lower from anchors)
content.location: Below Nowhere Man and right of Won't Back Down

content.description: Climb up the chert ball face.
content.protection: 1/2" bolt/hangers to sport anchors (clip and lower from sport anchors)
content.location: Just below 100 and above Stir It Up

content.description: Climb up the chert ball filled face above
content.protection: 1/2" bolts/hangers to sport anchors (please clip and lower to ground)
content.location: Between Cherry Bomb and Anyway You Want It

content.description: Climb up using the large chert balls/holds and limestone features. Sooo much fun!
content.protection: 1/2 " bolts/hangers, with sport anchors at the top. (please clip and lower from the anchors).
content.location: This is the most southern ( upper left ) climb on Cannonball Wall.

content.description: Climb up the chert filled face just to right of small vertical crack.
content.protection: 1/2" bolt/hangers to sport anchors (clip and lower to the ground)
content.location: Right of Dreamer, small crack between Dreamer and Dreams Die Hard.

content.description: Climb just left of small vertical crack up chert filled face.
content.protection: 1/2" bolt/hangers  to sport anchors (clip and lower)
content.location: Between Any Way You Want It and Dreams Die Hard, just to the left of a small vertical crack to sport anchors above

content.description: Climb up chert. Chert balls are unique and can be quite interesting. Have fun deciding which chert ball is better than the other.
content.protection: 1/2" bolt/hangers to sport hangers (please clip and lower back to the ground)
content.location: Between Eye in the Sky and Jaws

content.description: Climb the chert filled face above between Jaws and Dreamer.
content.protection: 1/2" bolts/hangers to sport anchors above (please clip and lower to ground)

content.description: Climb up the chert filled face to sport anchors above.
content.protection: 1/2" bolt/hangers to sport anchor (clip and lower from anchor
content.location: Between Dreams Die Hard and Nowhere Man, Starts directly behind the large tree adjacent to the cliff. This is the 100th climb built by Mike Engle, Chris Barnes and Vernon Phinney.
